# Hypha

> Hypha is a framework for developing distributed and collaborative applications. It provides a Remote Procedure Call (RPC) system that allows seamless communication between Python and JavaScript, supports serverless functions, ASGI web applications, file operations, artifact management, and vector search capabilities.

Hypha enables building distributed applications with Python and JavaScript. It features a robust RPC system for cross-language communication, supports running serverless functions, hosting ASGI web applications, and provides tools for file operations, artifact management, and vector search.

## Core Documentation
- [Getting Started](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/getting-started.md): Installation, server setup, and basic client-server communication
- [Configuration Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/configurations.md): Guide for configurations in Hypha
- [Service Type Annotation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/service-type-annotation.md): How to add type annotations to Hypha services
- [Serverless Functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/serverless-functions.md): How to define and use serverless functions in Hypha
- [ASGI Web Apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/asgi-apps.md): Using Hypha to serve ASGI web applications

## Features
- [Launch Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/launch-service.md): How to launch services in Hypha
- [Operate Files](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/operate-files.md): File operations in Hypha
- [Artifact Manager](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/artifact-manager.md): Managing artifacts with Hypha
- [Vector Search](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/vector-search.md): Using vector search capabilities in Hypha

## Optional
- [Migration Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/migration-guide.md): Guide for migrating between different versions of Hypha
- [Setup Authentication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/setup-authentication.md): How to set up authentication in Hypha
- [Hypha in Pyodide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amun-ai/hypha/refs/heads/main/docs/hypha-in-pyodide.md): Using Hypha with Pyodide for browser-based Python
